attributes.action: Prosecute cabinet members who have unlawfully claimed expenses.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: MP's who have unlawfully gained income from expenses fraud should be prosecuted the same as any other person who commits fraud. They go on about the amount of people committing benefit fraud and they are effectively doing it themselves.

rejection.details: The Attorney General's office have advised us that this is outside the PM's remit. The PM cannot instruct the police and CPS in this way. Anyone can refer a matter to the police for investigation and they have a discretion whether to investigate the matter or not, and the CPS have discretion on how to proceed following a police investigation.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
